name: Data Structures Library
description: A 3 phase, semester long project for my DSA class where I implemented 3 data structures using C++: Circular Dynamic Array, Red Black Tree, Heap/Binomial Heap.

name: Recipe Search API
description: A Next-js React app which uses the Spoontacular API to give users recipes for certain foods.

name: Agora
description: A full stack web app using PERN stack to model user CRUD operations. Idea was to build a employee food marketplace trading platform.

name: Image PPM Processor
description: A PPM image processor using C programming language that allows for manipulation and modification of PPM image files.
